skins.shipDescription: Essex-class aircraft carrier ¨C Essex, Hull Number CV-9.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the nameship of the Essex-class carriers. Although I was built with great expectations, I was always overshadowed by Enterprise's success. If only I could have been deployed sooner...
skins.acquisition: So this is where Enterprise is... A-ahem! I am Essex, one of the Union's state-of-the-art aircraft carriers. Commander, you can expect great things from me! I swear that I won't disappoint you!
skins.login: There you are. I've already finished preparing everything. Commander, give us your orders!
skins.details: What would you like to know, Commander? I'll answer to the best of my abilities.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Everyone knows that the Essex class is strong, but still, Enterprise is all they ever talk about... *sigh*...
skins.secretaryIdle2: There are a lot of ships in my class. As the nameship, I have to do everything I can to be a good role model...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Musashi and Yamato? They were... yes, formidable rivals worthy of respect. I hope I can meet them again one day.
skins.secretaryTouch: Time to sortie?! Just leave it to me! Oh... you just wanted to chat...?

skins.shipDescription: I'm not trying to go anywhere in particular; I just want to enjoy the scenery along the way. Commander, let's go experience the thrills of the road together.
skins.acquisition: I'm not trying to go anywhere in particular; I just want to enjoy the scenery along the way. Commander, let's go experience the thrills of the road together.
skins.login: Commander, have you put on your helmet yet? We're about to get going!
skins.details: Even being able to see a small portion of these 2448 miles has been an eye-opening experience. Though I wasn't able to ride from sea to shining sea, what an unforgettable journey it's been!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Enterprise advised me to pursue some hobbies that aren't related to combat... This should count as one of those.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Combat is something that must be done at full throttle. It'd be dangerous to do that while riding though...
skins.secretaryIdle3: You followed us the entire way? What an incredible eagle!
skins.secretaryTouch: Phew... Hm? This bottle of water is for me? Thank you very much! I'll help myself then.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, could you be... too tired to know what you're doing? I knew we should have stopped to rest...

skins.shipDescription: Commander?! Ah, um, no, I'm not drunk! ...I, uh, just had a bit too much to drink... just a bit! Please don't tell the others though!
skins.acquisition: Commander?! Ah, um, no, I'm not drunk! ...I, uh, just had a bit too much to drink... just a bit! Please don't tell the others though!
skins.login: Sorry, Commander, but could you give me a hand? ...Ugh, why is the hem of this dress so long...
skins.details: By the way, Commander, there's nobody else around, right? *sigh*... Thank god... If Enterprise or Shangri-La saw me like this, I'd die of¡ª ...Eh?! Shangri-La?! Wait, no, stop! Please, no photossssss!!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I even got Mr. Eagle here all decked out~ Looks pretty sharp and spiffy, right?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hey... Commander, um... Yeah, so... have you ever seen Enterprise get drunk before? Ah, no, I was just asking out of curiosity... I mean, it's almost impossible to picture that happening to her, right?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, don't worry about me. Don't you think you should head back to the venue before the others start to wonder where you went?
skins.secretaryTouch: One more cup... Just one more! Commander, here! Cheers! Thanks for everything you're always doing for us. This is... a token of gratitude from me... *hic*!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander! Jeez, what are you doing... Did you also have a bit too much to drink? What am I going to do...
